Articles.Content: Drinks anyone???

Only 4 pages to go until 100! We're gonna make it!

Keep up the hype!
I don't usually watch Squadcasts but I guess this week I'll try to catch it. Can't wait for all the things they (hopefully) reveal.

> Only 4 pages to go until 100! ...

cuz, like, ya know, there's only four (4) days left...

Been away from the hype for a day, HYPE ME!

Did you see that KSP youtube vid of a shuttle (Without wings) exploding?

> 
> When is the squadcast aired?

Tomorrow, at 4:30 PST (west coast US).

4 pages? 4 days till release? Half-life 3 confirmed?!?!

Even moar hype!

> 
> When is the squadcast aired?

At the top of the page is the main menu bar. Beneath that is a smaller menu bar containing the word 'Calendar'. That link will show you the calendar for upcoming livestreams in your local time.

Happy landings!
OMG Hypeballz 3000 omega win!!! i've had this game for 2 years and ive never been to any planet other than Duna, but i put a probe on Eve. Shoould i land on all planets before 1.0???

> 
> OMG Hypeballz 3000 omega win!!! i've had this game for 2 years and ive never been to any planet other than Duna, but i put a probe on Eve. Shoould i land on all planets before 1.0???

Yes. Good idea
3 pages to go. Choo chooooo!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T20:45:06Z" title="04/23/2015 08:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**
Wow! Page 97 already, We may yet get past some of the other hype threads. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
We gotta hype our way to 100, dammit!

Hype!

Today's video is early footage of the test of the hype plane. Turns out at that speed planes tend to break up.

> 
> Hype!
> Today's video is early footage of the test of the hype plane. Turns out at that speed planes tend to break up.

It has no wings, it is the hypetrain!

HYPE!
I fully expect that while I'm away this weekend, I will come back to 200+ Official Hype Pages.

> 
> I fully expect that while I'm away this weekend, I will come back to 200+ Official Hype Pages.

I you look at the time between posts, it increases exponentially (with drops at night around GMT) so it will certainly explode in the days before.
So, what will we do, if the hype train stalls? Add more boosters?

> 
> So, what will we do, if the hype train stalls? Add more boosters?

Start posting more HypeSpam.

> 
> So, what will we do, if the hype train stalls? Add more boosters?

The hypetrain is not stalling, .90 hypetrain only had 111 pages TOTAL.
Engage hypedrive now!
Yowza! I was in a meeting all day.. The hype is flowing...

I've done the engineering calculations, and we'll have enough Hype to go to Superplaidic velocities almost exactly 2 days before release (Saturday). Keep in mind it takes a LOT of power to go past ludicrous speed and into Plaid, because we have to be going to fast we *rip space a new one and travel orthogonally to the three spatial dimensions*
I'm pretty sure we're on a trajectory to Ludicrous Speed at least, if not Plaid - no chance of stalling.
